roleset.name: go into, enter
roleset.note: PENETRATE-V NOTES: Yeah, but what's a collar? (from penetrate.01-v)

example.name: cloak and dagger
example.text: He probably didn't penetrate any top-secret files, but the KGB in East Berlin was willing to pay two of his associates, Peter Carl and Dirk Brezinski, $15,000 for some of the material Hess collected.

example.name: passive, unclear meaning to me
example.text: ``[The collar]-1 was penetrated *trace*-1 on a number of occasions, ''meaning securities firms figured out ways to conduct program trades to circumvent the collar and use the Big Board's electronic trading system, Mr. Phelan said.
example.arg: meaning securities firms figured out ways to conduct program trades to circumvent the collar and use the Big Board's electronic trading system

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: MacArthur ordered U.S. troops to continue their penetration of North Korea all the way to the Yalu River, the North Korea/Red China boundary line.
